Question: Which of the following options better summarizes your movement?  
Choice:  
A. I look over the city from the rooftops, moving along the sides of the buildings to the main doors and windows.  
B. I align myself from the street facing the high-rise building and reach the height of the main entrance by hovering in place.  
C. I quickly descend from the corner of the building to the lower window.  
D. I overlook the city from the rooftop and reach the mid-level windows by ascending to the top floor.  
E. I move from facing the door and windows directly back to the rooftop panorama.

This aligns with option A's description of looking over the city from rooftops and moving along the sides of buildings to the main doors and windows.
